item.description:
Update 3/11/11:  Got your quarters ready?  We hope so because this will be a blast.  We spoke with Joseph's and there are no reservations needed, you will need to pay the bus driver, which is CASH ONLY no exceptions.  The bus leaves promptly at 12:45 from Stoneham, but lets meet at 12:15 to ensure everyone boards together.  The bus will leave Mohegan promptly at 10PM, if you miss the bus you will need to find your own transportation home and your bus ticket will not be refundable.  The cost is $30.00, this includes the round trip bus fair, a $15.00 meal coupon, 2 - $10.00 free bets & 1 - $5.00 free bet....that is a steal, you pay $30.00 to get $40.00.

Hope to see you all in Stoneham at the pickup site.

  

Donna & Janet

 

 

 

 

 

Let's take a trip down to Mohegan Sun Casino on Joseph's Limosine Bus Trips. The trip has a few pickup locations over the north shore, leaves mid day and returns at night.

The following are the departure places and times, we ask that everyone arrive at least 15 mins prior to the departure time:

Burlington, Corner of Mall Rd & lexington st (near Kohls) 12;30PM

Stoneham, Redstone Plza (near Dunkin Donuts) 12:45pm
Medford Square, near CVS 1:00pm
Everett, Glendale Sq near Walgreens 1:15pm
Revere, Northgate Shopping Center near Taco Bell 1:30pm

lReservations: We will be updating this site once we have a number of yes RSVPS and we contact Joseph's for a payment Options so please check back at a later date for direction on hos to reserve your bus ticket

Bus departs the Casino at 10:00pm sharp.

So round up those dollar bills and join us at this fun event.

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the organizers near Dunkin Donuts
item.name: Mohegan Sun Bus Trip
